com.facebook.rendercore.utils

Class MeasureSpecUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.rendercore.utils.MeasureSpecUtils

  • public class MeasureSpecUtils
extends Object
    An utility class to verify that an old measured size is still compatible to be used with a new measureSpec.
